patch.description: Update an instance of 'LandedCostsCodes' with the given payload of type 'LandedCostsCode' in JSON format and with the specified id.

get.description: Retrieve all or some selected properties from an instance of 'LandedCostsCodes' with the given id.

delete.description: Delete an instance of 'LandedCostsCodes' with the specified id.

post.description: Create an instance of 'LandedCostsCodes' with the given payload of type 'LandedCostsCode' in JSON format.

get.description: Retrieve a collection of 'LandedCostsCodes' with all or some selected properties in the given order by specifying the given filter condition.

info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.
info.title: Swagger For Service Layer

tags.name: LandedCostsCodes
tags.description: This entity enables you to manipulate 'LandedCostsCodes'. It defines various types of landed costs (for example, insurance, customs) and their default distribution rules. When you record landed costs for deliveries, landed costs are allocated to the goods according to the distribution rule of each type.
